thread.title: New Delhi: Bharti Airtel selects Ericsson to roll out 4G in Delhi: Ericsson statement
thread.title_full: BRIEF-New Delhi: Bharti Airtel selects Ericsson to roll out 4G in Delhi: Ericsson statement | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: New Delhi: Bharti Airtel selects Ericsson to roll out 4G in Delhi: Ericsson statement
text:
Sept 2 (Reuters) -
* New delhi: Ericsson statement: Bharti Airtel selects Ericsson to expand 3G network in India
* New Delhi: Ericsson statement: Bharti selects Ericsson to roll out 4G in Delhi
* New Delhi: Ericsson has four-year agreement with Bharti Airtel for above 4G rollout and 3G expansion: statement (Reporting By Tommy Wilkes in NEW DELHI)
